Instance.description: An interaction that immediately changes the object color value of an object.

TunableEnum.name: dialog_style
TunableEnum.description: Formatting of the color picker dialog.

TunableVariant.name: object_color_operation
TunableVariant.description: Define the operation we're going to execute. We can either apply the color to a light or to a ghost sim.

TunableTuple.name: to_ghost
TunableTuple.description: The interaction displays a dialog that changes the ghost's color.

TunableTuple.name: to_light
TunableTuple.description: The interaction displays a dialog that changes the light's color or intensity.

TunableVariant.name: light_target
TunableVariant.description: Define the set of lights this operation applies to (e.g. All Lights, This Room, All Candles, etc...)

TunableTuple.name: all_lights
TunableTuple.description: The target are all lights, except those tagged as manual lights.

Tunable.name: include_common_area
Tunable.description: If set, all lights in common areas of apartments or residential rental will be considered.

TunableTuple.name: room_lights
TunableTuple.description: The target are all lights in the same room as the interaction target, expect manual lights.

TunableTuple.name: specific_lights
TunableTuple.description: The target are all lights with a specific tag, including lights tagged as manual lights.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: An object with any tag in this set is a potential target of this interaction, provided it has a lighting component.

TunableTuple.name: this_light
TunableTuple.description: The target is the light that is the target of the interaction.

TunableEnum.name: palette_colors
TunableEnum.description: The palette of colors to show in the dialog.

TunableVariant.name: palette_label
TunableVariant.description: Override the label of the color palette.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

TunableVariant.name: slider_label
TunableVariant.description: Override the label of the slider.
